Interface ResortControl

public interface ResortControl

interface ResortControl specifies requirements for 7COM1015 (Sem A) 2018

Version:
09/11/18
Author:
A.Marczyk

Method Detail

canTravel

boolean canTravel(int trId,
                  java.lang.String shtlCode)
Returns true if a Card is allowed to move using the shuttle, false otherwise A move can be made if: the rating of the card >= the rating of the destination world AND the destination world is not full AND the card has sufficient credits AND the card is currently in the source world AND the card id is for a card on the system AND the shuttle code is the code for a shuttle on the system

Parameters:
trId - is the id of the card requesting the move
shtlCode - is the code of the shuttle journey by which the card wants to pCardel
Returns:
true if the card is allowed on the shuttle journey, false otherwise

topUpCredits

void topUpCredits(int id,
                  int creds)
Allows a card to top up their credits.This method is not concerned with the cost of a credit as currency and prices may vary between resorts.

Parameters:
id - the id of the card toping up their credits
creds - the number of credits purchased to be added to cards information

toString

java.lang.String toString()
Returns all of the details of all worlds including the cards currently on each world, on "No cards"

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
all of the details of all worlds including location and all cards currently on each world, or "No cards"

travel

java.lang.String travel(int pCardId,
                        java.lang.String shtlCode)
Returns the result of a card requesting to move by Shuttle. A move will be successful if: the luxury rating of the card >= the luxury rating of the destination world AND the destination world is not full AND the card has sufficient credits AND the card is currently in the source world AND the card id is for a card on the system AND the shuttle code is the code for a shuttle on the system If the shuttle journey can be made, the card information is removed from the source world, added to the destination world and a suitable message returned. If shuttle journey cannot be made, the state of the system remains unchanged and a message specifying the reason is returned.

Parameters:
pCardId - is the id of the card requesting the move
shtlCode - is the code of the shuttle journey by which the card wants to pCardel
Returns:
a String giving the result of the request
